choices: bounty hunters came with a mission to take the crystals
the chief atlantian was upducted by spies
the daughter of the chief atlantian falls in love with a scrawny traveler
one of the atlantians have been assassinated
the chief atlantian's daughter took most of the crystals for herself
1.content: Many many years ago a sacred city filled with people who believed in an all powerful god who said was the creater of atlantis and that atlantis was made from the purest grounds of the earth.Unfortunatly there are some people from other lands who only believe in greed and money and power.Every time the atlantians show other people the crystal caverns of hope(where the atlantians get thier spiritual energy)all of the travelers only saw the money and power they could get.But atlantians have always believed in the good in people and gave the travelers another chance,until it happened.
1.title: In The Beggining

info.description: A short story i came up with about the city of atlantis.
